en.title: FE Donates RM 5,000.00 to Malaysian Mental Health Association.
en.content:
FE is proud to donate RM 5,000.00 to support the Malaysian Mental Health Association's (MMHA) Big Walk 2008. A mock up cheque was presented by FE's CEO Paul Ting to Datin Dr. Ang Kim Teng. Several of FE's Leaders and Spokeswomen, National and Olympian Walker, Yuan Yu Fang and Champion Power lifter, Ms Law, were there to support the Big Walk at Dataran Padang Petaling Jaya on 19th October 2008, in conjunction with World Mental Health Day.

MMHA is a non-governmental association established since 1967. MMHA's centre runs a day psychiatric rehabilitation service, public and family educational service as well as community public awareness programmes for better mental health towards a better quality of life for all Malaysians.
